sentences: Martin Bulloch (born 14 August 1974) is a Scottish musician, best known for being the drummer in the rock band Mogwai.
Bulloch was born in Bellshill, North Lanarkshire, Scotland.
He was once a cook at a Chinese restaurant in East Kilbride.
Mogwai was formed in 1995 by friends Stuart Braithwaite, Dominic Aitchison, and Bulloch.
